data.description: Highest and Best Monday, April 8th at 9pm!  Check out this adorable one-story home in Eastpointe! It's got 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and yep, laundry right on the first floor – no basement lurking! Plus, there's a detached garage to keep your car cozy or stash your treasures. And guess what? The kitchen's packed with appliances that are sticking around just for you. It's the perfect little spot to start your next chapter. Don't just drive by – come on in and find your happy place!
